backend/main.mo: Motoko actor storing visitor messages in a list with functions to submit and retrieve all messages.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping high-level UI features to related frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing responsibilities of all major frontend components, hooks, and sections.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining CSS variables for light/dark themes and global styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry file with SEO metadata, fonts, favicon, and root div for mounting the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component configuring theme, React Query, navigation, sections, and layout structure.
Wrapper component that animates child content into view using IntersectionObserver and motion preferences.
frontend/src/components/Figure.tsx: Reusable figure component for images with optional captions and responsive styling.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with about text, quick links, social icons, and dynamic year.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCards.tsx: Component rendering styled quote cards with gold accents and optional authors.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form section with client-side validation and message submission via a custom hook, showing a success state after sending.
frontend/src/components/sections/Documen: Documentary content section displaying styled narrative text and quotes about Hazrat Sakhi Habib Sultan Nangiana.
frontend/src/components/sections/Gallery: Image gallery section with a grid of photos and a lightbox viewer supporting navigation and keyboard controls.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with background imagery, title, and a call-to-action button that scrolls smoothly to the documentary section.
frontend/src/components/sections/Reflect: Renders a themed reflection section with decorative elements and religious narrative text about patience and trust. Uses AnimatedSection and Heart icon for visual emphasis.
frontend/src/components/sections/ShrineL: Displays shrine information, spiritual legacy descriptions, and animated statistical counters. Combines icons, text blocks, and count-up components in a styled layout.
frontend/src/components/sections/Storyte: Provides a storytelling card explaining the origin of the Nangiana name with decorative effects. Uses Card components, icons, and narrative paragraphs.
frontend/src/components/sections/Timelin: Shows a four-item spiritual timeline with icons and descriptions inside animated, styled cards. Iterates through predefined timeline items within a grid layout.
frontend/src/components/SpiritualModeTog: Toggle button that enables a session-persisted “spiritual mode” and controls playback of a looping ambient audio clip.
frontend/src/components/StickyNav.tsx: Sticky top navigation bar with scroll progress, section highlighting, mobile menu, and integrated spiritual mode toggle.
frontend/src/hooks/useActiveSection.ts: Tracks which section is currently visible using IntersectionObserver and returns the active section ID. Updates state when observed elements intersect the viewport.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor using Internet Identity and react-query. Recreates and invalidates dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCountUpOnView.ts: Animates a count-up effect when an element becomes visible using IntersectionObserver and easing. Supports reduced-motion preferences and returns a ref and current count.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context with login, logout, and identity loading. Wraps AuthClient setup and exposes identity state and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Detects user's reduced-motion preference via a media query and updates state on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollProgress.ts: Provides a hook that calculates and updates scroll progress as a percentage.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionState.ts: Implements sessionStorage-backed state with automatic persistence and initialization.
frontend/src/hooks/useSubmitVisitorMessa: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting visitor messages using an actor and shows toast notifications.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles, custom theme variables, and component utilities for the emerald-gold design system.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, and plugins aligned with the site's theme.
project_state.json: Stores project configuration, goals, features, image requirements, and architectural notes for the build.
